alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Canadian; Grady (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 5:53PM CDT until April 23 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GRADY...NORTHEASTERN CADDO AND CENTRAL CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of Cogar, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... El Reno, Union City, Calumet, Lookeba, Cogar, Concho and Cedar Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
